content:
Safety Note: Azide salts are potentially explosive. Only small amounts of material should be prepared, and these should be handled with great caution.

Synthesis of [Mn(II)(2,2′-bpy)(HCO<sub>2</sub>)<sub>2–<italic toggle="yes">x</italic> </sub>(N<sub>3</sub>)<sub> <italic toggle="yes">x</italic> </sub>] (<bold>1</bold>, <italic toggle="yes">x</italic> = 0.3; <bold>2</bold>, <italic toggle="yes">x</italic> = 0.6; and <bold>3</bold>, <italic toggle="yes">x</italic> = 0.7)

2,2′-bpy and NaN3 were dissolved in 20 mL of methanol in an ultrasonic bath, and then the mixture was added to Mn(HCO2)2. After stirring for half an hour, the white solid was dissolved and turned yellowish. Yellow crystals of 1–3 were obtained via filtration in ∼30% yield based on Mn(HCO2)2. The ratios of the reactants of 2,2′-bipyridine, NaN3, and Mn(HCO2)2 are 4:1:4, 3:1:3, and 2:1:2, respectively, giving 1, 2, and 3. Anal. Calcd for 1: N, 13.53; C, 46.80; H, 3.26. Found: N, 13.50; C, 45.21; H, 3.36. Anal. Calcd for 2: N, 17.78; C, 45.74; H, 3.16. Found: N, 17.53; C, 45.51; H, 3.24. Anal. Calcd for 3: N, 19.20; C, 45.38; H, 3.13. Found: N, 18.99; C, 44.78; H, 3.50.
clean_text:
Safety Note: Azide salts are potentially explosive. Only small amounts of material should be prepared, and these should be handled with great caution.

Synthesis of [Mn(II)(2,2'-bpy)(HCO2)2-x (N3) x ] (1, x = 0.3; 2, x = 0.6; and 3, x = 0.7)

2,2'-bpy and NaN3 were dissolved in 20 mL of methanol in an ultrasonic bath, and then the mixture was added to Mn(HCO2)2. After stirring for half an hour, the white solid was dissolved and turned yellowish. Yellow crystals of 1-3 were obtained via filtration in ~30% yield based on Mn(HCO2)2. The ratios of the reactants of 2,2'-bipyridine, NaN3, and Mn(HCO2)2 are 4:1:4, 3:1:3, and 2:1:2, respectively, giving 1, 2, and 3. Anal. Calcd for 1: N, 13.53; C, 46.80; H, 3.26. Found: N, 13.50; C, 45.21; H, 3.36. Anal. Calcd for 2: N, 17.78; C, 45.74; H, 3.16. Found: N, 17.53; C, 45.51; H, 3.24. Anal. Calcd for 3: N, 19.20; C, 45.38; H, 3.13. Found: N, 18.99; C, 44.78; H, 3.50.
